- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Farrah, Hope you are doing well. I just wanted to connect with you and see if we could schedule a time to speak. Take care,Sars From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, August 16, 2012 5:22 PM To: 'Farrah Holder' Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Farrah, No need to apologize at all, I just wanted to connect. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. Looking forward to connecting,Sara From: Farrah Holder [mailto:fholder@thinknxtmktg.com] <mailto:[mailto:fholder@thinknxtmktg.com]> Sent: Thursday, August 16, 2012 5:07 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners I am. I will email you some dates/times tomorrow. Sorry about that.
Best,Farrah Sent from my iPhone On Aug 16, 2012, at 4:50 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> wrote:Hi Farrah, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on my email below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, August 08, 2012 12:52 PM To: 'fholder@thinknxtmktg.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:fholder@thinknxtmktg.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Farrah, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVlWuUNz%2BdyNKqDjlDvYbpWjr7szCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
